Yu-Hua Chen

Ph.D. Student
National Taiwan University
f08946011@ntu.edu.tw


About Me

I am a Computer Science Ph.D. student at the National Taiwan University working with Prof. Yi-Hsuan Yang and Prof. Jyh-Shing Roger Jang at the Music and AI Lab. I hold a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science from National Cheng Kung University.

My research interests focus on guitar-oriented music information retrieval, including transformations between different representation formats of guitar music. Recently, I have been concentrating on creative guitar amplifier tone modeling. I am also an intermediate electric guitar player, and I enjoy listening to anime, J-POP, and hard rock music.

If you need to contact me for any reason, you can reach me via email, and collaboration is welcomed.

Research Interests

  • Music Information Retrieval: music transcirption, audio synthesis, tone modeling
  • Machine Learning: generative adversarial networks, feature disentanglement

Selected Publications

  1. Towards zero-shot amplifier modeling: One-to-many amplifier modeling via tone embedding control
    Yu-Hua Chen, Yen-Tung Yeh, Yuan-Chiao Cheng, Jui-Te Wu, Yu-Hsiang Ho, Jyh-Shing Roger Jang, and Yi-Hsuan Yang,
    Int. Society for Music Information Retrieval Conference 2024

  2. Improving unsupervised clean-to-rendered guitar tone transformation using GANs and integrated unaligned clean data
    Yu-Hua Chen, Woosung Choi, Wei-Hsiang Liao, Marco Martínez-Ramírez, Kin Wai Cheuk, Yuki Mitsufuji, Jyh-Shing Roger Jang and Yi-Hsuan Yang
    International Conference on Digital Audio Effects 2024
    PDF Demo

  3. Neural amplifier modelling with several GAN variants
    Yu-Hua Chen, Woosung Choi, WeiHsiang Liao, Marco A. Martinez Ramirez, Kin Wai Cheuk, Yi-Hsuan Yang, and Yuki Mitsufuji,
    Int. Society for Music Information Retrieval Conference 2023, LBD (late-breaaking and demo paper)
    PDF Demo

  4. Towards automatic transcription of polyphonic electric guitar music: A new dataset and a multi-loss transformer model
    Yu-Hua Chen, Wen-Yi Hsiao, Tsu-Kuang Hsieh, Jyh-Shing Roger Jang, and Yi-Hsuan Yang
    IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech and Signal Processing 2022
    PDF Demo

  5. Automatic composition of guitar tabs by Transformers and groove modeling
    Yu-Hua Chen, Yu-Siang Huang, Wen-Yi Hsiao, and Yi-Hsuan Yang
    Int. Society for Music Information Retrieval Conference 2020
    PDF Demo

  6. Demonstration of PerformanceNet: A convolutional neural network model for score-to-audio music generation
    Yu-Hua Chen, Bryan Wang and Yi-Hsuan Yang
    Int. Joint Conf. Artificial Intelligence 2019, demo paper
    PDF
